mapper.insert:
insert into task_run_record
task_run_record.task_id,
task_run_record.page_downloaded,
task_run_record.success,
task_run_record.worker_joined,
task_run_record.start_time,
task_run_record.end_time
values
#{taskId},
#{pageDownloaded},
#{success},
#{workerJoined},
#{startTime},
#{endTime}
mapper.update:
update task_run_record
task_run_record.task_id = #{TaskId},
task_run_record.page_downloaded = #{PageDownloaded},
task_run_record.success = #{Success},
task_run_record.worker_joined = #{WorkerJoined},
task_run_record.start_time = #{StartTime},
task_run_record.end_time = #{EndTime}
task_run_record.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select task_run_record.id, task_run_record.task_id, task_run_record.page_downloaded, task_run_record.success, task_run_record.worker_joined, task_run_record.start_time, task_run_record.end_time form task_run_record
task_run_record.id = #{id}
